column2: "Afei Filistiafo boaboaa hɔn dɔm ano dɛ wɔrobɔko
column3: na wɔkɔboaa ano wɔ Soko a ɔyɛ Juda dze no
column4: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Soko na Azeka ntamu wɔ Efes-dammim."

column2: "Na Saul na Israel mbarimba no boaboaa hɔn ano
column3: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Ela bɔnsa mu
column4: na wɔbaa mpasuar wɔ Filistiafo no do."

column2: "Na Filistiafo no gyinaa bepɔw no do wɔ afa kor: na Israel so gyinaa bepɔw no do wɔ afa kor: na bɔnsa da hɔn ntamu."
"Na ɔkatakyi bi fi Filistiafo nseraban mu puei
column3: wɔfrɛ no Goliat
column4: ofi Gat
column5: ne tsentsen yɛ basafa ebiasa na nsama."

column2: "Na borankyɛw hyɛ ne tsir
column3: na ɔhyɛ boran-bon akontar
column4: na akontar no no dur tow boran ndwetɛbona mpemenum."

column2: "Na kɔɔber anan nkataho kata n’anan ho
column3: na boran ogyapatsia wɔ ne mbatsir ntamu."

column2: "Na ne peaa no kura tse dɛ ɔtanwemfo n’asadua; na ne peaa ne tsir tow dadze dwetɛbona ahaesia: na no kokyɛmsoafo dzi n’enyim."
"Na obegyinae na ɔtseaa mu frɛɛ Israel dɔm no
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom epue abɛbaa hom mpasuar yi? Ana mennyɛ Filistianyi
column5: na hom yɛ Saul no nkowaa bi a? Hom nsan mu nyi ɔbarimba bi mma hom ho
column6: na wɔmma onsian mbra me nkyɛn ɛ."

column2: "Sɛ otum nye me ko
column3: na oku me a
column4: ɔno yɛbɛyɛ hom nkowaa: na sɛ midzi no do nyim na muku no a

column2: "Na Filistianyi no see dɛ
column3: Ndɛ da yi murutwa Israel dɔm no mpoa; hom mma me ɔbarimba bi
column4: ma yɛnko."

column2: "Na aber a Saul na Israel nyinara tsee Filistianyi no ne nsɛm no
column3: hɔn abaw gowee
column4: na wosuroo kɛsenara."

column2: "David yɛ Jesse a ɔyɛ Efratnyi a ofi Bɛtlɛhɛm-juda no ne babanyin. Nna Jesse yi wɔ mbabanyin baawɔtwe: na Saul ne nda no mu no
column3: nna ɔbarimba no ayɛ akɔdaa a oedzi mfe ara yie wɔ adasa mu."

column2: "Na Jesse ne mbabanyin mpanyin baasa no dzii Saul n’ekyir kɔr ɔsa: na ne mbabanyin baasa a wɔkɔr ɔsa no hɔn edzin nye Eliab
column3: abakan no
column4: na nyia odzi n’ekyir nye Abinadab
column5: na nyia otsia ebiasa nye Samma."

column2: "Nna David na ɔyɛ kaekyir wɔ mu: na mpanyimfo baasa no dzii Saul n’ekyir kɔree."
"Na David dze
column3: odzii akɔnaaba wɔ Saul no som mu na n’egya no nguan no nhwɛe wɔ Bɛtlɛhɛm."

column2: "Na Filistianyi no twee bɛɛn anapa na ewimbir
column3: na ɔyɛɛ dɛmara adaduanan."

column2: "Na Jesse see ne ba David dɛ
column3: Afei fa ndzɛmba yi
column4: eburow kyewee efa yi na paanoo du yi
column5: na soa ka woho ara kɔ nsera mu fa kɛma wo nuanom;"

column2: "na fa kyiise du yi kɛma hɔn apem do safohen no
column3: na hwɛ mbrɛ wo nuanom hɔn ho tse
column4: na gye hɔn hɔ asɛnkyerɛdze bra."

column2: "Ber no
column3: nna Saul na Israel mbarimba no nyinara
column4: wɔ Ela bɔnsa no mu

column2: "Na David soɛɛr ahanamakye
column3: na ɔdaan nguan no gyaa ɔhwɛfo
column4: na ɔfae kɔree
column5: dɛ mbrɛ Jesse hyɛɛ no no; na okodur mbrɛ ntseaseanam no wɔ
column6: aber a dɔm a wɔrokɔ akono no wɔrobɔ ose gye do."

column2: "Na Israel na Filistiafo no baabaa mpasuar
column3: dɔm hwɛ dɔm enyim."

column2: "Na David dze n’adzesoadze no hyɛɛ adzesoadze do hwɛfo no ne nsa
column3: na otutuu mbirika kɔr dɔm no nkyɛn
column4: na ɔkɔree kekyiakyiaa no nuanom no."

column2: "Na ɔnye hɔn rekasa no
column3: hwɛ
column4: ɔkatakyi no
column5: Filistianyi a ofi Gat no a wɔfrɛ no Goliat no fi Filistiafo mpasuar no do puei
column6: na ɔbɛkaa nsɛm kor no ara: na David tsee."

column2: "Na aber a Israel mbarimba no nyinara hun ɔbarimba no
column3: wofii n’enyim guanee
column4: osiandɛ wosuroo dodow."

column2: "Na Israel mbarimba no see dɛ
column3: Ana hom ehu ɔbarimba yi a oepue yi? Ampaara Israel ara na ɔaba rubotwa hɔn mpoa: na ɔbɛba dɛ
column4: nyimpa a oboku no no
column5: ɔhen dze ahonya kɛse bɛma oenya noho
column6: na ɔdze ne babaa ama no awar
column7: na ɔama n’egya fie afa noho edzi wɔ Israel."

column2: "Na David bisaa mbarimba a wogyina ne nkyɛn no dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na wɔbɛyɛ ama nyimpa a oboku Filistianyi yi
column4: na oeyi ahorohoraa efi Israel do no? Na Filistianyi monomonomnyi so nye woana
column5: na obotwa tseasefo Nyankopɔn no dɔm mpoa yi?"

column2: "Na nkorɔfo no buaa no dɛmara
column3: dɛ
column4: Mbrɛ wɔbɛyɛ ama nyimpa a oboku no nye no."

column2: "Na aber a ɔrekasa kyerɛ mbarimba no
column3: no nua panyin Eliab tsee; na Eliab n’ebufuw dzɛwee wɔ David do
column4: na ɔsee dɛ
column6: na woana na edaan nguan kakra a wɔwɔ sar no do no gyaa no? Minyim wo ntsɛn na w’akoma mu ahopɔw: ɔko ara na ebae bɔhwɛe."

column2: "Na David see dɛ
column3: Na mayɛ dɛn? Ana onnyi siantsir bi a?"

column2: "Na ɔdaan noho fii ne nkyɛn kɔr obi so do
column3: na obisaa no dɛmara
column4: na nkorɔfo no buaa no bio dɛ nkan no dze no ara."

column2: "Na aber a wɔtsee nsɛm a David kae no
column3: wɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ Saul: na ɔsomae ma wɔkɛfaa David bae."

column2: "Na David see Saul dɛ
column3: Mma onnsian Filistianyi no ntsi ma nyimpa biara n’akoma mmpa; w’akowaa bɔkɔ na ɔnye Filistianyi yi akɔko."

column2: "Na Saul see David dɛ
column3: Irunntum nnkɔ ɔbarimba yi do nnkɛnye no nko: osiandɛ ɔwo dze eyɛ abofra
column4: na ɔnodze ɔyɛ ɔsabarimba dze fi no mbofra mu."

column2: "Naaso David see Saul dɛ
column3: W’akowaa hwɛ n’egya no nguan; na sɛ ogyata anaa osisi ba bɛkyer eguambaa wɔ nguankuw no mu a
column6: na mukotu hyɛ no do na miyi no mifi n’anomu: na sɛ ɔsoɛr mo do a
column8: na mobɔ no na muku no."

column2: "W’akowaa ku gyata na osisi nyina mpo: na Filistianyi monomonomnyi yi dze
column3: ɔbɛyɛ dɛ hɔn mu baako
column4: ɔnam dɛ oetwa tseasefo Nyankopɔn no dɔm mpoa ntsi."

column2: "Na David see dɛ
column3: EWURADZE a oyii me fii gyata na osisi nsamu no
column4: ɔnoara na obeyi me efi Filistianyi yi nsamu. Na Saul see David dɛ

column2: "Na Saul dze ne ntar hyɛɛ David
column3: na ɔdze boran kukukyɛw hyɛɛ ne tsir
column4: na ɔdze dadze atar hyɛɛ no."

column2: "Na David dze n’afona bɔɔ n’atar do
column3: na ɔnantsewee hwɛe; osiandɛ nna ɔnnsɔɔ bi nnhwɛe. Na David see Saul dɛ
column4: Munnkotum medze iyinom akɔ; osiandɛ monnsɔe nnhwɛɛ da. Na David yiyii no wɔ no ho."

column2: "Na ɔfaa no poma kitsaa ne nsamu
column3: na ɔpaa nkokwabo enum wɔ ɔwora no mu
column4: na ɔdze guu oguanhwɛfo kotoku a ɔwɔ no mu
column5: mekyerɛ no bɔtɔ no mu a; na ne tsiabo kitsa ne nsamu: na ɔtwee piin Filistianyi no."

column2: "Na Filistianyi no bae ara twee piin David; na ɔbarimba a ɔso akokyɛm no dzi n’enyim."
"Na Filistianyi no totoo n’enyi
column3: na ohun David no
column4: obuu no enyimtsia: osiandɛ ɔyɛ abofra koraa

column2: "Na Filistianyi no see David dɛ
column3: Ana ɔkraman nye me na edze mpoma reba mo do yi? Na Filistianyi no frɛɛ n’enyame dze paa David."

column2: "Na Filistianyi no see David dɛ
column3: Bra me nkyɛn
column4: na medze wo nam bɛma wimu ntumbowa

column2: "Nna David see Filistianyi no dɛ
column3: Ɔwo edze afona
column4: na ɔnye mpeaa
column6: reba mo do: na emi dze
column8: Israel dɔm a etwa hɔn mpoa no hɔn Nyankopɔn no ne dzin mu na mereba."

column2: "Ndɛ da yi EWURADZE beyi wo ahyɛ me nsa; na meku wo
column3: na meyi wo tsir wɔ do; na medze Filistiafo dɔm no hɔn efun ama wimu ntumbowa
column4: na asaase do mbowadoma abɔyafo ndɛ; ama asaase nyinara eehu dɛ Nyankopɔn bi wɔ Israel:"

column2: "na ama bagua yi nyinara ehu dɛ EWURADZE ɔno ɔnndze afona na peaa na ɔdze gye nkwa: osiandɛ ɔko no yɛ EWURADZE dze
column3: na ɔdze hom bɛhyɛ hɛn nsa."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: Filistianyi no soɛree
column4: na ɔbae na ɔtwee piin dɛ oribehyia David no
column6: na otutuu mbirika kɔr dɔm no do dɛ orikehyia Filistianyi no."

column2: "Na David dze ne nsa dɔɔ no kotoku no mu
column3: na oyii ɔbo wɔ mu
column4: na ɔtoow no tsiabo mu
column6: wɔ no momapɔw do; na ɔbo no kɔdɔɔ no momapɔw no mu
column7: na ɔhwee daadze ma n’enyim butuuw famu."

column2: "Dɛm na David dze tsiabo na ɔbo dzii nyim wɔ Filistianyi no do
column3: na ɔbɔɔ Filistianyi no
column4: na okum no; nna afona bi nndze David ne nsamu."

column2: "Nna David tutuu mbirika na okegyinaa Filistianyi no do
column3: na osuoo n’afona no mu
column4: na ɔtwee fii no bɔha mu
column6: na ɔdze twaa ne tsir. Na Filistiafo no hun dɛ hɔn ɔkatakyi no ewu no

column2: "Na Israel na Juda mbarimba no soɛree
column3: na wɔbɔɔ ose gyee do
column4: na wotsiiw Filistiafo no dze kodur dɛ erobɔkɔ Gai na Ekron mbobotsenano. Na Filistiafo no hɔn epirafo hwehwee daadze wɔ Saaraim ɔkwan mu araa dze kodur Gat

column2: "Na Israelmba no gyaa Filistiafo no do ka na wɔsanee
column3: na wɔbɔfoow hɔn asesee no."

column2: "Na David faa Filistianyi no ne tsir no
column3: na ɔdze baa Jerusalɛm; na n’akodze no dze ɔdze guu n’asesee no mu."

column2: "Na aber a Saul hun dɛ David rokɔ Filistianyi no do no
column3: ɔsee ne sahen Abner dɛ
column4: Abner
column5: na abofra yi woana ba a? Na Abner see dɛ
column6: Dɛ wo kra tse ase yi

column2: "Na ɔhen no see dɛ
column3: Bisabisa nyia ne ba nye abɔtoaba yi."

column2: "Na David kokum Filistianyi no na ɔreba no
column3: Abner faa no
column4: na ɔdze no baa Saul n’enyim
column5: nna Filistianyi no ne tsir dze ne nsamu."

column2: "Na Saul see no dɛ
column3: Woana ba nye wo
column4: aberantsɛ? Na David buaa dɛ
column6: Bɛtlɛhɛmnyi no ne ba nye me."
